description.original: A command palette that does all of the things you want it to do.
description.translation: A command palette that does all of the things you want it to do.

dict.text:\"Add a new Command to the macro\": text:"Add a new Command to the macro"
dict..setDesc(\"Show the plugin name in the c: .setDesc("Show the plugin name in the command palette")
dict..setDesc(\"This text will be displayed n: .setDesc("This text will be displayed next to recently used items")
dict..setDesc(\"Create a new grouping of comm: .setDesc("Create a new grouping of commands that can be run together")
dict..setName(\"Use shift to create files and: .setName("Use shift to create files and cmd/CTRL to open in new tab")
dict..setDesc(\"Close the palette when there: .setDesc("Close the palette when there is no text and backspace is pressed")
dict..setDesc(\"Sorts the suggestion so that: .setDesc("Sorts the suggestion so that the recently used items show before pinned items.")
dict..setDesc('For those users who have use a: .setDesc('For those users who have use a "Hyper Key", enabling this maps the icons "⌥ ^ ⌘ ⇧" to the caps lock icon "⇪" ')
dict..setDesc(\"By default cmd/ctrl is used t: .setDesc("By default cmd/ctrl is used to create files and shift is used to open in new tab. This setting reverses that to mimic the behavior of the standard quick switcher.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, only notes names: .setDesc("If enabled, only notes names will be displayed in Quick Switcher mode instead of their full path.")
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, Markdown notes wi: .setDesc("If enabled, Markdown notes will be displayed without their .md extension in Quick Switcher mode")
dict..setDesc('A comma separated list of file: .setDesc('A comma separated list of file extensions (ex: "pdf,jpg,png") that should not be shown when searching files.')
dict..setDesc(\"The prefix used to tell the p: .setDesc("The prefix used to tell the palette you want to search files")
.setDesc("The prefix used to tell the palette you want to search tags")
dict..setDesc(\"The hotkey used to switch to: .setDesc("The hotkey used to switch to command search while using the command palette.")
.setDesc("The hotkey used to switch to file search while using the command palette.")
.setDesc("The hotkey used to switch to tag search while using the command palette.")
dict..setDesc(\"The number of items that will: .setDesc("The number of items that will be in the suggestion list of the palette. Really high numbers can affect performance")
dict..setDesc(\"Allows autodetecting of hotke: .setDesc("Allows autodetecting of hotkey modifier or forcing to Mac or Windows")
dict..setMessage(`Error: \"${i.name}\" cannot: .setMessage(`Error: "${i.name}" cannot be used in this context. The macro is stopping.`)
